languages.text: {n}Статный эльдарский воин выходит вперед, оглядывая спокойным взглядом вторженцев. Его броня и украшения сияют на солнце, несмотря на следы спекшейся крови и грязи.{/n} "Мой народ {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}наслышан о тебе{/d}, элантах". {n}Бархатистый голос ксеноса звучит чужеродно в диких лесах Кетца Темера.{/n} "Ты здесь, чтобы помочь нам свершить правосудие? Или подобно большинству мон-кай решил{mf||а} предать тех, кому однажды протянул{mf||а} руку помощи?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Статный эльдарский воин выходит вперед, оглядывая спокойным взглядом вторженцев. Его броня и украшения сияют на солнце, несмотря на следы спекшейся крови и грязи.{/n} "Мой народ наслышан о тебе, элантах". {n}Бархатистый голос ксеноса звучит чужеродно в диких лесах Кетца-аль Хета.{/n} "Ты здесь, чтобы помочь нам свершить правосудие? Или подобно большинству мон-кай решил{mf||а} предать тех, кому однажды протянул{mf||а} руку помощи?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"
languages.original_text: {n}Статный эльдарский воин выходит вперед, оглядывая спокойным взглядом вторженцев. Его броня и украшения сияют на солнце, несмотря на следы спекшейся крови и грязи.{/n} "Мой народ {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}наслышан о тебе{/d}, элантах". {n}Бархатистый голос ксеноса звучит чужеродно в диких лесах Кетца Темера.{/n} "Ты здесь, чтобы помочь нам свершить правосудие? Или подобно большинству мон-кай решил{mf||а} предать тех, кому однажды протянул{mf||а} руку помощи?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked blood.{/n} "My people have heard about you, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will you betray the ones you have once helped like most mon-keigh would?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"

traits.locale_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Un majestuoso guerrero Aeldari da un paso al frente y mira a los intrusos con expresión tranquila. Su armadura y sus ornamentos relucen a la luz del sol pese a las manchas de barro seco y sangre apelmazada.{/n} «Mi gente {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}ha oído hablar de ti{/d}, elantach». {n}La suave voz del xenos parece fuera de lugar en la agreste espesura de Quetza Temer.{/n} «¿Has venido para ayudarnos a hacer justicia? ¿O piensas traicionar a quienes ya ayudaste una vez, como haría cualquier otro mon-keigh?».
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un majestuoso guerrero Aeldari da un paso al frente y mira a los intrusos con expresión tranquila. Su armadura y sus ornamentos relucen a la luz del sol pese a las manchas de barro seco y sangre apelmazada.{/n} «Mi gente ha oído hablar de ti, elantach». {n}La suave voz del xenos parece fuera de lugar en la agreste espesura de Quetza Temer.{/n} «¿Has venido para ayudarnos a hacer justicia? ¿O piensas traicionar a quienes ya ayudaste una vez, como haría cualquier otro mon-keigh?».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}一位面目庄严的艾达灵族战士走上前来，平静地看着入侵者。尽管他的盔甲和饰品沾着干泥与血迹，但依然在阳光下闪闪发光。{/n}“我的族人{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}听说过你{/d}，外界人。”{n}这位异形优雅流畅的声音，与格扎尔特默的粗犷荒野显得格格不入。{/n}“你是来帮助我们伸张正义的吗？还是说，你会像绝大多数猴子那样，背叛那些你曾经帮助过的人？”
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位面目庄严的艾达灵族战士走上前来，平静地看着入侵者。尽管他的盔甲和饰品沾着干泥与血迹，但依然在阳光下闪闪发光。{/n}“我的族人听说过你，外界人。”{n}这位异形优雅流畅的声音，与格扎尔特默的粗犷荒野显得格格不入。{/n}“你是来帮助我们伸张正义的吗？还是说，你会背叛你曾经帮助过的人，就像绝大多数猴子那样？”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Un majestueux guerrier aeldari s'avance en observant calmement les intrus. Son armure et ses ornements brillent au soleil malgré la boue et le sang séché qui les souillent.{/n} « Mon peuple a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}entendu parler de vous{/d}, elantach. » {n}Sa voix douce contraste vivement avec les terres sauvages de Quetza Temer.{/n} « Êtes-vous ici pour nous aider à rendre justice ? Ou comptez-vous trahir ceux que vous avez aidés auparavant, comme le feraient la plupart des mon-keigh ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un majestueux guerrier aeldari s'avance en observant calmement les intrus. Son armure et ses ornements brillent au soleil malgré la boue et le sang séché qui les souillent.{/n} « Mon peuple a entendu parler de vous, elantach. » {n}Sa voix douce contraste vivement avec les terres sauvages de Quetza Temer.{/n} « Êtes-vous ici pour nous aider à faire justice ? Ou comptez-vous trahir ceux que vous avez aidés auparavant, comme le feraient la plupart des mon-keigh ? »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}風格のあるアエルダリの戦士が一歩前に進み、落ち着いて侵入者たちを見つめる。その男の鎧と飾りは、乾いた泥とこびりついた血が跡になって付着しているというのに、太陽の光を受けて輝いている。{/n}「我が種族は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}お前の噂を聞いているぞ{/d}、エランタ」{n}その異種族の淀みない言葉は、ケツァ・テメルの荒野にはそぐわない響きだった。{/n}「我々に協力して公正な裁きを下しに来たのか？それとも、多くのモン＝ケイのように、かつて手を貸した者たちを裏切りに来たか？」
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"

traits.locale_text: {n}風格のあるアエルダリの戦士が一歩前に進み、落ち着いて侵入者たちを見つめる。その男の鎧と飾りは、乾いた泥とこびりついた血が跡になって付着しているというのに、太陽の光を受けて輝いている。{/n}「我が種族は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}お前の噂を聞いているぞ{/d}、エランタ」{n}その異種族の淀みない言葉は、ケツァ・テメルの荒野にはそぐわない響きだった。{/n}「我々に協力して公正な裁きを下しに来たのか？それとも、多くのモン＝ケイのように、かつて手を貸した者たちを裏切りに来たか？」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Ein stattlicher Aeldari-Krieger tritt vor und blickt ruhig auf die Eindringlinge. Seine Rüstung und ihre Dekorationen glänzen in der Sonne, trotz des getrockneten Schlamms und Bluts.{/n} "Mein Volk hat {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}von Euch gehört{/d}, Elantach." {n}Die samtene Stimme des Xenos klingt in der rauen Wildnis von Quetza Temer fehl am Platz.{/n} "Seid Ihr hier, um für Gerechtigkeit zu sorgen? Oder werdet Ihr Euch wie die meisten Chem-Pan-Sey verhalten und jene verraten, denen Ihr einst geholfen habt?"
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein herrschaftlicher Aeldari-Krieger tot vor und blickt ruhig auf die Eindringlinge. Seine Rüstung und ihre Dekorationen glänzen in der Sonne, trotz des getrockneten Schlamms und Bluts.{/n} "Mein Volk hat von Euch gehört, Elantach." {n}Die samtene Stimme des Xenos klingt in der rauen Wildnis von Quetza Temer fehl am Platz.{/n} "Seid Ihr hier, um für Gerechtigkeit zu sorgen? Oder werdet Ihr — wie die meisten Chem-Pan-Sey es tun würden — die verraten, denen Ihr einst geholfen habt?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Heybetli bir Aeldari savaşçısı, öne doğru bir adım atarak sakince istilacılara bakıyor. Zırhıyla işlemeleri, kurumuş çamur ve taşlaşmış kan lekelerine rağmen güneşte ışıldıyor.{/n} "Halkım {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}seni tanıyor{/d} elantach." {n}Zenonun pürüzsüz sesinin Quetza Temer'in acımasız yaban hayatıyla ters düşen bir tınısı var.{/n} "Bize adaleti sağlamamızda yardım etmeye mi geldin? Yoksa çoğu mon-keigh gibi davranıp bir vakitler yardım ettiklerine ihanet mi edeceksin?"
languages.original_text: {n}A stately Aeldari warrior steps forward, calmly looking at the intruders. His armour and its adornments gleam in the sun despite the traces of dried mud and caked-on blood.{/n} "My people have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}heard about you{/d}, elantach." {n}The smooth voice of the xenos sounds out of place in the rough wilderness of Quetza Temer.{/n} "Are you here to help us deliver justice? Or will behave as most mon-keigh would and betray those you once helped?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heybetli bir Aeldari savaşçısı, öne doğru bir adım atarak sakince istilacılara bakıyor. Zırhıyla işlemeleri, kurumuş çamur ve taşlaşmış kan lekelerine rağmen güneşte ışıldıyor.{/n} "Halkım {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_AeldariAlly}seni tanıyor{/d} elantach." {n}Zenonun pürüzsüz sesinin Quetza Temer'in acımasız yaban hayatıyla ters düşen bir tınısı var.{/n} "Bize adaleti sağlamamızda yardım etmek için mi geldin? Yoksa çoğu mon-keigh gibi davranıp bir vakitler yardım ettiklerine ihanet mi edeceksin?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
